uk.co.cbray.msc.nhsdsp.dao

Class IllnessRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.cbray.msc.nhsdsp.dao.IllnessRepository

  • public class IllnessRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    An implementation of the Facade design pattern, this class encapsulates persistence logic for Illnesses and provides a simple and readable api.
    Author:
    Connor Bray
